title: Jotstick 1.0 (Fixed)
description:
From publisher site (www.jotstick.com):

Jotstick is a revolutionary new tool for interacting with and recording your screen.  Jotstick makes it easy to create training videos, enhance presentations, take illustrated snapshots, and more.  Simple to use and packed with powerful features for the professional, Jotstick takes the Desktop to a whole new level.

Uses:
* Educational videos
* Interactive presentations
* Creating documentation
* Customer support
* Design and prototyping
* Creative desktops
* and much, much more!

Features:
* MP4/AAC video recording
* Live video presenter window
* Fullscreen and window modes
* Smooth, accurate drawing
* One click switch between drawing and interacting 
* Lossless snapshots
* 50 Levels of Undo
* Quick copy to pasteboard
* Uses newest Leopard features
* Up to 24 FPS recording
